TG Therapeutics使用Maxcyte的FlowElectroporation®技术和Expert™平台来支持Azer-Cel的开发和商业化，即其同种异体CD19 CAR T细胞疗法，用于治疗自身免疫性疾病Maxcyte，Inc。是一家领先的细胞工程专业公司带有TG Therapeutics的许可证（SPL）是一家完全集成的商业阶段，生物制药公司，重点是对B细胞疾病的新型治疗方法的获取，开发和商业化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/tg-therapeutics-to-use-maxcytes-maxcytes-flow-electroporationc2ae-technology-and-technology-and-experte284a2-plateform-plateform of-azer-cel-it-ins-clogeneic-cd19-car-t-cell-t-cell-therapy-therapy-promongrogron-for-automune-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/tg-therapeutics-to-use-maxcytes-maxcytes-flow-electroporationc2ae-technology-and-technology-and-experte284a2-plateform-plateform of-azer-cel-its-colenogenic-cd19-car-t-cell-t-cell-theraphy-theraphy-program program-for-automune-diseases.aspx＃评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6828c99b-9286-4dd9-8204-0ff095551a16 Wed, 12 Feb 2025 22:53:00 -0500 TG Therapeutics to use MaxCyte's Flow Electroporation® technology and ExPERT™ platform to support the development and commercialization of azer-cel, its allogeneic CD19 CAR T cell therapy program, for the treatment of autoimmune diseases
